endpoints.description: Create a new production order for glass products.
Retrieve the current status of a specific production order.
Submit specific configuration data to a machine in the production line.
Obtain performance metrics for all machines within the facility.
Schedule a quality control test for a batch of produced glass items.
View current raw material inventory levels in the facility.
Update the inventory levels for a specific material.
Receive notifications about maintenance alerts or production anomalies.
Generate a detailed production and quality control report.
Cancel an existing production order by its identifier.
